title: Dynamic options don't load after changing credentials
content:
After updating the credentials of LDAP and JDBC endpoints using Endpoint credentials manager, the dynamic options related to these endpoints aren't loading while creating/modifying configuration options properties.

Cause

This issue occurs because the LDAP and JDBC endpoints continue to use the cache of the original credentials despite these credentials being changed/updated.

Solution

As and when you update these credentials, restart the On-Premise Bridge (OPB) Agent.

For information on how to restart the OPB agent, see:

  • Start or stop an agent (Windows)
  • Start or stop an agent (Linux)
